docs.lead_paragraph: When Dahlov Zorach was 3 years old she scrawled a wobbly drawing in pencil and said it was a picture of a tiger. Her father, the sculptor, William Zorach, saved the drawing. He continued to save examples of her work as she grew up, and a selection of it ...
